last_episode_to_air.overview: The star cast of the hit web series, Anil Kapoor, Aditya Roy Kapoor, Sobhita Dhulipala, Ravi Behl and Tillotama Shome, rejoin Kapil as they create many more moments of pure laughter and entertainment together.
last_episode_to_air.name: The Night Manager Of Entertainment

episodes.name: FAN Special with Shah Rukh Khan
episodes.overview: Kapil Sharma and his partners in crime, Sunil Grover, Kiku Sharda, Ali Asgar, Chandan Prabhakar, and Simona Chakravarti have a laughter riot with the king of romance, Shah Rukh Khan. Sunil Grover's gerua to jabra fan act with SRK, in front of a packed Delhi audience, is to die for.

episodes.name: Tiger Shroff and Shraddha Kapoor in Kapil's Mohalla
episodes.overview: The action hunk Tiger Shroff and the gorgeous Shraddha Kapoor visit Kapil Sharma's mohalla and its hilarious inhabitants to promote their romance and action packed movie Baaghi. It’s time to get your dose of laughter with Kapil Sharma and gang.

episodes.name: Yo Yo Ka Halla in Kapil's Mohalla
episodes.overview: Singing sensation Yo Yo Honey Singh visits India's favourite mohalla to promote his upcoming film. It's time to get your dose of laughter with Kapil Sharma and gang.

episodes.name: Wasim Akram ka Jalwa
episodes.overview: Cricketing legend Wasim Akram visits India's favourite mohalla to promote his upcoming film. It's time to get your dose of laughter with Kapil Sharma and gang.

episodes.name: Emraan Hashmi, Prachi Desai, Lara Dutta, Mohammad Azharuddin
episodes.overview: Emraan Hashmi, Prachi Desai, Lara Dutta and Mohammad Azharuddin all arrives to Promote the upcoming film "Azhar" which is based on former Indian Cricket Captain Mohammad Azharuddin.

episodes.name: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Randeep Hooda
episodes.overview: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Randeep Hooda along with the director Omung Kumar comes to Kapil for the promotion of the Film Sarabjit 2016 which is a Biopic of Sarabjit Singh.

episodes.name: Saina Nehwal Ka Smash
episodes.overview: Kapil is playing cricket today with fellow characters to get selected in the IPL. Saina Nehwal tells some part of the journey, how she became Indian badminton player and world no.1 in Women's Singles.

episodes.name: Housefull of Masti
episodes.overview: Akshay Kumar, Abhishek Bachchan and Ritesh Deshmukh comes to visit Kapil Sharma for whole of 1 hour to promote their new film called Housefull 3.

episodes.name: Housefull of Masti Continues
episodes.overview: Kapil and Chandu dress up as Father and Mother and goes to Dr. Mashoor Gulati to ask his daughter for marriage. After the act Chunky Pandey and Jackie Shroff join Akshay Kumar, Abhishek Bachchan and Ritesh Deshmukh and the Masti continues.

episodes.name: Ravishing Raveena & 'DJ' Bravo
episodes.overview: Kapil dress up as a Doctor and along with Dr. Mashoor Gulati tries to fool a bank inspector to loan money. Later Raveen Tondon an Bollywood actress and Dwayne Bravo a West Indies Cricketer comes to Indian T.V Show for the first time.

episodes.name: Gayle Storms While Kanika Sings
episodes.overview: Big Six Hitter Chris Gayle from West Indies comes to the Show later followed by Bollywood Singers Kankia Kapoor and Mikha Singh. Chris Gayle at the end promotes his book called "Six Machine"

episodes.name: Team CID in Kapil's Mohalla
episodes.overview: Cast of CID a Indian television series comes to Kapil's show, Cast includes Dayanand Shetty, Aditya Srivastava and Shivaji Satam known for their role Inspector Daya, Inspector Abhijeet and A.C.P. Pradyuman.

episodes.name: Mohalle Mein Shaadi
episodes.overview: Bollywood's newly wed Bipasha Basu and Karan Singh Grover comes to the show.

episodes.name: Sania Mirza & Farah Khan
episodes.overview: Navjot Singh Sidhu escorts Sania Mirza Indian Women's Tennis Player to the show later followed by Farah Khan a Bollywood Choreography.

episodes.name: Do Lafzon Ki Kahani with Kapil
episodes.overview: Chandu's Wife has arrived and is very angry, she gets in argument with everybody else. After, Amaal Malik, Armaan Malik, Kajal Aggarwal and Randeep Hooda comes to the show to promote their upcoming Romantic film Do Lafzon Ki Kahani.

episodes.name: Team Sairat in Kapil's Mohalla
episodes.overview: Kapil and cast dresses up as school kids in order to con school grant inspector to get a grant of Rupees 25 Lakhs. Later Rinku Rajguru and Akash Thosar actors known Marathi Film "Sairat" appears to the show along with some of their cast.

episodes.name: Shilpa, Shamita in Kapil's Mohalla
episodes.overview: The gorgeous Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty along with her sister Shamita Shetty shares a fun time with Comedy King Kapil Sharma in his Mohalla. The two sisters creates a laughter riot sharing their childhood stories. It is Raj Kundra who surprises his wife Shilpa in a Sardar Avtar in the 17th Episode of ‘The Kapil Sharma Show’.

episodes.name: Special Guest Rahat Fateh Ali Khan
episodes.overview: Everybody is into Music today, they all try to impress Nurse Lottery by singing her songs and speaking Urdu Language. Latter Rahat Fateh Ali Khan, a singer from Pakistan Origin famous for devotional music of the Muslim Sufis comes to the Show.

episodes.name: Star Cast of Raman Raghav 2.0
episodes.overview: Kapil tries to convince the gang to be his wife for a day so that he can get the money his grandfather left him. Later Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Vicky Kaushal and Anurag Kashyap comes to the show for the promotion of the upcoming film Raman Raghav 2.0.

episodes.name: Rocking Govinda in Kapil's Mohalla
episodes.overview: Promoting Jagga Jasoos. Its Khajoor's Birthday, Chandu have invited Govinda to the show. Later followed by his wife and daughter Sunita and Tina Ahuja.

episodes.name: Navjot Kaur Sidhu in Kapil's Mohalla
episodes.overview: Kapil, Chandu and Dr. Mashoor Gulati opens their own sari shops and try to influence a couple to buy from their shop. Later Mrs Navjot Kaur Sidhu appears first time on a Indian T.V Show.

episodes.name: Wadali Bandu Night
episodes.overview: Shri Puran Chand Wadali, Pyarelal Wadali and Lakhwinder Wadali who are Sufi singers and musicians from Guru Ki Wadali in the Amritsar District in Punjab comes to the show.

episodes.name: Sultan In Kapil's Mohalla
episodes.overview: Salman Khan and Anushka Sharma comes to The Kapil's Show to promote their film Sultan.

episodes.name: Madaari Ka Khel in Kapil's Mohalla
episodes.overview: Irrfan Khan and Jimmy Shergill comes to promote their upcoming film 'Madaari'.

episodes.name: Great Grand Masti with Kapil Sharma
episodes.overview: Vivek Oberoi, Aftab Shivdasani and Riteish Deshmukh comes to the show to promote their upcoming film "Great Grand Masti". Later Urvashi Rautela who is the lead actress of the and Indra Kumar, director of the film joins them.

episodes.name: Music Maestro A.R Rahman
episodes.overview: Allah-Rakha Rahman aka A. R. Rahman, is an Indian composer, singer-songwriter, music producer, musician and philanthropist comes to the show.
