The Madness Returns
episodes.overview: The greatest comedy show is back on air. Everyone's beloved Kapil Sharma is back for another season of his super hit show. Tonight on this grand stage of laughter, we proudly welcome the cast of Simba, directed by Rohit Shetty. Ranveer Singh and Sara Ali Khan are here to join Kapil on his mission to make us laugh out loud. So sit back, relax and begin this journey of laughter, comedy and humorous jokes.

episodes.name: A Night To Remember
episodes.overview: Tonight on The Kapil Sharma Show, we greet the cast of Simmba. Ranveer, Sara, and director Rohit are joined by Sonu Sood. The entertainment advances and the jokes are just a level over. Watch and laugh out loud.

episodes.name: The Khan Brothers Are Here
episodes.overview: Hold your breath, cause' Kapil Sharma is back with another season of his superhot show, and on tonight's episode its humor crossing all levels. Acts that will make you giggle and laugh out loud, and jokes that are just right on the entertainment scale. Our guests tonight are the famous, inspirational, lovable and phenomenal Khans of the Bollywood industry. Salman Khan joined by his two brothers Sohail and Arbaaz. Watch as the brother's team up with our super funny host and breaks all bounds of laughter.

episodes.name: The Legend
episodes.overview: The One the only, the legend Salim Khan is here tonight on this epic stage. Watch as our lovable host Kapil introduces the guest tonight, the Khan brothers and the father as well. We just might have to claim that the whole "Khan-Dan" is here tonight. Watch and roll over in laughter.

episodes.name: Amazing Super-Duo Yami Gautam And Vicky Kaushal
episodes.overview: Tonight on this splendid stage of The Kapil Sharma Show, our dear host Kapil Sharma is back with two of the film industry's top-rated actors. Please welcome the inspirational, the gifted and the super gorgeous Yami Gautam and joining her is, Vicky Kaushal the dashing stud of Bollywood. They are here to spark up the stage and blast bundles of joy and laughter, and to talk about their upcoming movie "Uri: The Surgical Strike". So grab your popcorn, and put on those smiley glasses, it's going to be a hilarious and entertaining ride.

episodes.name: The Golden Hero Shatrughan Sinha
episodes.overview: Tonight on the Kapil Sharma Show, our host Kapil is exultant to present one of Bollywood's most golden actors. Please welcome the evergreen Shatrughan Sinha, his presence is just enchanting, joining him is his wife and son, Poonam Sinha and Luv Sinha. Watch as the star family laughs and crack jokes, with the one and only Kapil.

episodes.name: Fun With Team Why Cheat India and Sunny Leone
episodes.overview: It's a star-studded night on tonight's episode of the Kapil Sharma Show as the 'Why Cheat India' star Emraan Hashmi, along with Guru Randhawa, grace the stage. Also making an appearance on the show is Sunny Leone. Why Cheat India co-star Shreya Dhanwanthary joins Emraan Hashmi on the show. So sit back and enjoy this star-studded night with your favorite host Kapil Sharma.

episodes.name: Please Welcome Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Amrita Rao
episodes.overview: Bollywood's most versatile actor, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, who is playing the role of Bal Thackeray in the upcoming movie Thackeray, is here tonight with his co-star in the film Amrita Rao. Also, Kapil Sharma revives his most loved character, Rajesh Arora in this fun-filled episode. So, sit back and get ready to laugh out loud with your favorite host Kapil Sharma.

episodes.name: Republic Day With The Idols
episodes.overview: On this special occasion of republic day, Kapil introduces the stars of Indian Idol and the special judges. Watch as they have fun and crack jokes to make us laugh. Enjoy this full packed humor with a touch of musical talent from our Idols.

episodes.name: The Father-Daughter Duo
episodes.overview: Today on this epic day, please welcome on this epic Kapil Sharma stage, Anil Kapoor and Sonam Kapoor and Rajkummar Rao, joining them is the phenomenal Juhi Chawla. They also talk about their new movie, Ek Ladki Ko Dekha Toh Aisa Laga. Watch as these super celebs laugh and spread happiness around. Kapil, Baccha and Krushna are always there to put a smile on our faces.

episodes.name: The Mirza Sisters
episodes.overview: Kapil has brought yet another super celebrity on his stage on tonight, it's one of the most renowned sports woman o our country. Please welcome Sania Mirza, accompanying her is her famous fashion designer sister Anam Mirza. Watch as the Mirza sister take Kapil's class. Laugh, enjoy and have a night of humor.

episodes.name: The Sister Trio
episodes.overview: It's time for some dance, music, and lights. Please welcome Neeti, Shakti and Mukti Mohan. These three Mohan sisters are incredibly talented and they are here together to shake up things in the Kapil Sharma Show. So sit back relax and enjoy.

episodes.name: The Gully Boy Is Here
episodes.overview: An epic day on this epic stage, please put your hands together for the stunning Ranveer Singh and joining him tonight is the glamorous Alia Bhatt. This awesome duo will set the stage on fire, watch as they rap, sing, dance and laugh to the humorous jokes.

episodes.name: When Dance Meets Comedy
episodes.overview: Tonight the cast of Super Dancer Chapter 3, are here in the Kapil Sharma Show. Watch as the super judges share laughter and smiles with Kapil and his clan of comedians. Watch as Shilpa, Geeta and Anurag enjoy themselves, so sit back and relax.

episodes.name: Total Dhamaal
episodes.overview: Tonight on the Kapil Sharma Show, we are proud to welcome the superstars of Total Dhamaal, Anil Kapoor, Madhuri Dixit Nene, Ajay Devgn, Riteish Deshmukh, and the talented director, Indra Kumar. Watch as they have fun, crack jokes and enjoy.

episodes.name: The Dhamaal Continues
episodes.overview: Tonight on the Kapil Sharma Show, we bring back our guests from last night. Please welcome the cast of Total Dhamaal once again. put your hands together or Anil Kapoor, Madhuri Dixit Nene, Ajay Devgn, and Ritesh Deshmukh, joining them is the director Indra Kumar. Watch as they enjoy and laugh out loud.

episodes.name: The Celebrity Cricket League
episodes.overview: Please welcome, Suniel Shetty, Sohail Khan from Mumbai Heroes, Jisshu Sengupta from Bengal Tigers, Navraj Hans from Punjab De Sher, Manoj Tiwari and Dinesh Lal Yadav from Bhojpuri Dabanngs, Sudeep from Karnataka Bulldozers, Rajeev Pillai from Kerala Strikers, Sachin Joshi from Telegu Warriors. All of the celebrity superstars from the CCL are here to joke around, laugh out loud and to break a leg with Kapil, in The Kapil Sharma Show. Watch as these superstars enjoy and have a blast.

episodes.name: The Cast Of Sonchiraiya
episodes.overview: Tonight on the Kapil Sharma Show, please welcome the gorgeous and phenomenal Bhumi Pednekar, accompanying her are the super talented actors, Sushant Singh Rajput, Ranvir Shorey, Manoj Bajpayee, and Ashutosh Rana. Watch as they have fun, crack up, and enjoy.

episodes.name: Luka Chuppi With Kartik Aaryan and Kriti Sanon
episodes.overview: Tonight on the Kapil Sharma Show, please welcome Kartik Aaryan and Kriti Sanon, the cast of Luka Chuppi. In this episode, Kapil Sharma returns with his humorous Rajesh Arora avatar. Baccha Yadav hosts a humorous game show with Kartik Aaryan and Kriti Sanon as the contestants. Watch as the guests have fun, crack up, and enjoy.

episodes.name: The Musical Blast
episodes.overview: Tonight on the Kapil Sharma Show we have four very famous and talented singers. Please welcome, Daler Mehndi, Jasbir Jassi, Mika Singh, and Hans Raj Hans. Watch as these four singers have a blast and turn this into comedy musical.

episodes.name: The Legends Of 1983 World Cup
episodes.overview: Tonight on The Kapil Sharma Show, please welcome the legends of 1983 Champion Indian Cricket team. Put your hands together for Kapil Dev, Mohinder Amarnath, Sandeep Patil, Dilip Vengsarkar, Krishnamachari Srikkanth, Roger Binny, Kirti Azad, Madan Lal, Syed Kirmani, Balwinder Sandhu, Yashpal Sharma. Watch as these evergreen legends laugh and enjoy on the Kapil Sharma Show.

episodes.name: 1983 World Cup Fever Continues
episodes.overview: Tonight on The Kapil Sharma Show, our 1983 World Cup legends from yesterday are here with us, and they have more to share and more to laugh about. Watch as Kapil Dev, Mohinder Amarnath, Sandeep Patil, Dilip Vengsarkar, Krishnamachari Srikkanth, Roger Binny, Kirti Azad, Madan Lal, Syed Kirmani, Balwinder Sandhu, Yashpal Sharma hold the stage once again, and we also have extraordinary cricketer Harbhajan Singh sharing smiles and laughing out loud.

episodes.name: Cast Of Kesari
episodes.overview: Tonight on the Kapil Sharma Show, please welcome the cast of Kesari. Put your hands together for Akshay Kumar and Parineeti Chopra. The fun doesn't end here, our audience tonight are the brave men of Central Reserve Police Force, they come to the stage and show that there's is more to being a soldier.

episodes.name: Best Of The Best
episodes.overview: Tonight on the Kapil Sharma Show, it's an evening of wonder. Watch as the cast of the movie Notebook, graces us with their appearance, please welcome Zaheer Iqbal and Pranutan Bahl. Watch as these two superstars enjoy and entertain us. Next with us, its three of India's most poetic and talented personalities, the master of poetry Arun Gemini, the extraordinary Pradeep Chaubey and the super gifted Anjum Rehbar.

episodes.name: The Sensational Sonu Nigam
episodes.overview: Tonight on the Kapil Sharma Show, we have as our guest the most versatile singer Bollywood industry saw during the late 90's and early 2000's, Sonu Nigam and his wife Madhurima Nigam.

episodes.name: Welcome Vidyut Jammwal and Jubin Nautiyal
episodes.overview: Kapil Sharma and his crew perform a play on bollywood party. Later they welcome the crew of Junglee on their sets.

episodes.name: Old Is Gold
episodes.overview: Today, Kapil Sharma welcomes the legends of the 70's era, Waheeda Rehman, Asha Parekh and Helen. Watch the insights of the golden times of bollywood from them.

episodes.name: Welcome The Dance Masters
episodes.overview: Today in Kapil Sharma Show, please welcome the dance masters of bollywood, Remo D'souza and Ganesh Acharya!

episodes.name: John Abraham Crushes Kapil
episodes.overview: Watch the handsome hunk, John Abraham and the sensational Mouni Roy have some fun on the sets of The Kapil Sharma Show. Look at John share his appetite for a toned body and Mouni getting roasted for being a naagin. Stay tuned!

episodes.name: Bhojpuri Film Industry On National Television
episodes.overview: Watch the Bhojpuri film industry grace the stage of The Kapil Sharma Show with their presence. Nirahua and Khesari share some inside jokes about Bhojpuri film industry. The Kapil Sharma Show crew plays an interesting game of Ke Bhail Crorepati!

episodes.name: The Star-Cast Of Kalank
episodes.overview: Starting with a small skitt and Chandu being satirical, today on Kapil Sharma Show, welcome the cast of the upcoming movie, Kalank, where Kapil has an interesting conversation with Varun Dhawan, Alia Bhatt, Aditya Roy Kapur and Sonakshi Sinha. Stay tuned!

episodes.name: Star-Cast Of Kalank Can't Get Enough Of Kapil
episodes.overview: Watch Kapil take a dig at the exam season going on, and later on, the star cast of Kalank returns as they can't get enough of The Kapil Sharma Show Season 2. Stay tuned!

episodes.name: The "Bad Boy" Villains
episodes.overview: On today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show, Kapil kicks of his show by an act where he portrays a godman named Baba Blue. Later on, the crew of The Kapil Sharma Show invite the bad boys of the Indian Cinema industry, Ranjeet, Kiran and Gulshan Grover.

episodes.name: Melody and Music Hand In Hand
episodes.overview: Welcome Amit Kumar, the son of the great legend Kishore Kumar, and his family. They take us through the old times and share a few stories about Kishore Kumar.

episodes.name: Karan Johar And Kajol Have Coffee With Kapil
episodes.overview: On today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show, Kapil is in for a conversation with one of the examples of epitomes when it comes to friendship, Karan Johar and Kajol. Watch the two unravel some crazy stories about the older times and have some fun with Kapil too.

episodes.name: The Proud Women Cricketers Of India
episodes.overview: On today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show, the opening act by Chappu Sharma is regarding a security agency he owns and tries to provide security to a woman who visits. Also, today, the show welcomes the proud women cricketers of the Indian team and share some timeless stories with us.

episodes.name: The Star Cast of Badhaai Ho
episodes.overview: The opening act of today's show, we see Chandu getting injured by an accident about which he makes a hill out of a mole. Later on, Kapil welcomes the starcast of a satirical film Badhai Ho, Neena Gupta and Gajraj Rao.

episodes.name: Students Of The Year Chat With Kapil
episodes.overview: Today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show Season 2 kicks off with a stand up by Kapil in which he shares what happens in the Indian weddings. Later on, moving forward, Kapil welcomes the star cast of Student Of The Year 2, Tiger Shroff, Tara Sutaria and Ananya Pandey.

episodes.name: The Cast of De De Pyaar De Graces The Show
episodes.overview: Ajay Devgn, Tabu and Rakul Preet make their appearance in this episode to promote their latest film De De Pyaar De. Kapil introduces the two superstars on stage and engages in witty banter with them. Some guys from the audience are given a chance to propose to Tabu in their own unique ways. Rakul joins them for more fun and entertainment.

episodes.name: Mother's Day Special
episodes.overview: On the eve of mother's day, watch the beautiful mother of triplet children, a producer, direction and choreographer, the one and only Farah Khan. A standup act is dedicated to all mothers by Kapil and then Baccha Yadav does what he does best. Watch a tribute to Farah Khan by the cast of The Kapil Sharma Show!

episodes.name: Welcome Saina Nehwal And Parupalli Kashyap
episodes.overview: Today's episode kicks off with an act representing the rising water issues in India during the summers. Today the stage is graced by two great badminton players of India, Saina and Kashyap. Later on, Baccha gives his views on people using cameras to take selfies all the time.

episodes.name: Welcome Sakshi Malik, Yogeshwar Dutt, Manika Batra
episodes.overview: Today's episode starts with a funny incident that revolves around Bhuri and her life. A new security guard has come up, will the residents be able to live with him is the question. Today the stage is graced by Wrestlers Sakshi Malik, Yogeshwar Dutt and Table Tennis player Manika Batra. Episode spices up when Kapil starts talking with the players and asks Manika to do ramp walk.

episodes.name: Welcome Kumar Sanu And Sameer Anjaan
episodes.overview: Today's episode starts with Chandu coming in as a guest on the show and asks Kapil to treat him like a guest which doesn't go the way he wanted. Later on the show, Kapil welcomes legendary singer Kumar Sanu and the great lyricist Sameer Anjaan.

episodes.name: Welcome Usha Uthup And Sudesh Bhosle
episodes.overview: On today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show, we welcome one of the most renowned voices in the Indian cinema, Usha Uthup. Also, we welcome the great singer and even better mimicry artist, Sudesh Bhosle.

episodes.name: Welcome Superstar Duo
episodes.overview: On today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show, we welcome the very renowned actor of Bollywood Salman Khan and the super beautiful actress Katrina Kaif.

episodes.name: More Fun With Salman And Katrina
episodes.overview: On today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show, Kapil makes some more fun with the Bollywood superstar duo Salman Khan and Katrina Kaif. He makes them reveal some more secrets about their real life.

episodes.name: Welcome Abhay Deol And Mithila Palkar
episodes.overview: In today's episode, the star cast of Chopsticks graces Kapil's stage. Bhuri wants to buy a car but everything goes wrong when Chappu sells her a car which belonged to a police officer's son who is fallen unconscious in the car. Mithila shows her special talent using a cup.

episodes.name: Welcome Bhaichung Bhutia, Sandeep Singh, Dutee Chand
episodes.overview: Today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show kicks off with an act of Chappu and Sapna selling flats. Later, we welcome, Indian football legend, Bhaichung Bhutia, Ex-Indian Hockey Captain Sandeep Singh and athlete Duttee Chand.

episodes.name: Entering Kabir Singh
episodes.overview: In today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show, Chandu kicks off the day with his Chandu Ka Dhaba which he has opened and as usual, attract controversies from Kapil and the rest of the crew. Later on the show, we have, Shahid Kapoor and Kiara Advani.

episodes.name: Welcome Anupam Kher And Esha Gupta
episodes.overview: In today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show, Kapil starts the show with his evergreen jokes. Later Bollywood legend Anupam Kher and actress Esha Gupta too join the show for some more fun.

episodes.name: Welcome Alka Yagnik, Himesh Reshammiya And Javed Ali
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil welcomes three of the most legendary singers of Bollywood, Alka Yagnik, Himesh Reshammiya, and Javed Ali. Alka, Himesh, Javed, and Kapil set the stage on fire with their amazing voices. Chandu invites the guests to his hotel.

episodes.name: Welcoming The Cast Of Article 15
episodes.overview: Today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show Season 2 starts with Chandu trying to get married to a tree so that he can get married to Bhuri. Later on, we welcome, the cast of Article 15.

episodes.name: Welcome The Star Cast Of Booo
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil welcomes the star cast of Booo which includes Tushar Kapoor, Kiku Sharda, and Krushna Abhishek. Kapil asks Kiku and Krushna why did they take up roles somewhere else when they were earning so much at his show. Younger versions of Sapna and Baccha Yadav also appear in this episode.

episodes.name: Welcome Parthiv Patel, Surya Kumar Yadav, Deepak Chahar
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil shares his views on Live in relationships and Pre Wedding Photography. He then welcomes three of India's most talented cricketers, Parthiv Patel, Surya Kumar Yadav, and Deepak Chahar. Kapil asks the three of them why they chose cricket as their career and makes some funny assumptions

episodes.name: Welcome Singers Of One India My India Album
episodes.overview: In this episode, Kapil presents his views on Bikers, Traffic Jams, and GPS technology. Later on, he welcomes Singers and Directors of One India My India album. Sukhwinder Singh, Jubin Nautiyal set the floor on fire with their beautiful voices.

episodes.name: Welcome The Melodious Armaan Malik
episodes.overview: Today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show starts with Bachha Yadav's son's birthday where he is organizing a Qawwali. Later on, we welcome the melodious Armaan Malik.

episodes.name: A Show Full Of Stars
episodes.overview: In today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show, we see a lot of stars like Shakti Ji, Padmini Kolhapure, Saurabh Shukla, Jimmy Shergill and Mahie Gill, who visit the show and share their experience on and off the screen.

episodes.name: Welcome Gorgeous Kangana Ranaut
episodes.overview: In today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show, Kapil welcomes the talented and very beautiful Bollywood actress Kangna Ranaut and questions her about her upcoming projects. Kangna even shares a few of her many experiences.

episodes.name: The Night Of Poems
episodes.overview: Today's episode of The Kapil Sharma show starts with Sapna and Chandu's mother fighting over Chandu's existence. Later, on the show today, we welcome the renowned poets of the Indian society, Rahat Indori and Ashok Chakradhar.

episodes.name: The Cast Of Arjun Patiala
episodes.overview: Today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show starts with a stand up act by Kapil about summer vacations, which is followed by the cast of Arjun Patiala. Enjoy the rumble in the house.

episodes.name: The Cast Of Jabariya Jodi
episodes.overview: Today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show starts with a stand-up act by Kapil on the concept of couples. Later on the show, we welcome, the cast of Jabariya Jodi

episodes.name: The Cast Of Khandaani Shafakhana
episodes.overview: Today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show starts with a stand-up act by Kapil describing the flaws of Bollywood. Thereafter, we welcome the cast of Khandaani Shafakhana

episodes.name: A Night Of Cultures
episodes.overview: The show begins with a set made for some auction of antique handicrafts. This sketch comedy by Kapil generates a great atmosphere for our guests of the show, Ustaad Amjad Ali Khan(a famous Sitar player) with his sons Aman Ali and Ayan Ali perform their wonderful piece and set the mood for cultures tonight.

episodes.name: The Cast Of Mission Mangal
episodes.overview: In today's episode, we welcome the cast of Mission Mangal, which includes the superstar Akshay Kumar, Sonakshi Sinha, Taapsee Pannu.

episodes.name: Tribute To Kishore Kumar
episodes.overview: Today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show starts with a solo stand up act by Kapil on the current rainy season going on. Following the act, we welcome Amit Kumar and Sudesh Bhosle to give a tribute to Kishore Kumar.

episodes.name: Welcoming The Cast Of Batla House
episodes.overview: In today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show Season 2, we welcome the cast of Batla House, which includes Jon Abraham, Mrunal Thakur, Ravi Kishan.

episodes.name: A Night Full Of Warm Welcomes
episodes.overview: Kapil introduces the audience to a man named Ganesh who runs an NGO for stray animals. After that, he introduces The Dabbawalas from Mumbai. And then the guests for tonight enters, the star icon of their era, Bindu and Aruna Irani Ji. Stay tuned as he has many more surprises today. Relive the disco era of Bollywood with the guests of the show.

episodes.name: Welcoming Vicky Kaushal And Moroccan Beauty Nora Fatehi
episodes.overview: In today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show Season 2, Kapil welcomes the sensational Bollywood actor Vicky Kaushal and Moroccan beauty Nora Fatehi. Kapil makes a lot of fun with them and makes them reveal many of their secrets. Stay tuned for an exciting and fun-filled episode!

episodes.name: Welcome The Cast Of Saaho
episodes.overview: In today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show Season 2, we welcome the cast of Saaho, which includes Prabhas, Shradha Kapoor and Neil Nitin Mukesh. Stay tuned for a rib-tickling episode!

episodes.name: Welcoming The Cast Of Pailwaan
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil welcomes the cast of a new show on SET, Tara From Satara and talks about the plot of the show. And later Kapil invites the guests of tonight, lead stars of the movie Pailwaan, Sunil Shetty and Sudeepa Kichcha.

episodes.name: Sushant And Shraddha Share Laughs With Kapil
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil calls upon the cast of the upcoming movie Chhichhore, Sushant Singh Rajput and Shraddha Kapoor. Along with them, the writer and director Mr. Nitesh Tiwari also come to the show. Varun Sharma, Saher Shukla, Naveen Polishetty and Tushar Pandey are also welcomed to the show. Shraddha's school friend, Fazaa also comes to the set and shares her experiences with the audience. Stay tuned to know more!

episodes.name: The Deol Family Comes Together
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil welcomes the lead cast of Pal Pal Dil Ke Paas. Sunny Deol is the director of this movie and shares his experience of working with his son. Karan Deol and Sahher Bamba are the debut lead in this movie. The Deol family comes together to share a wonderful time with Kapil on the show. Stay Tuned to have a humorous evening.

episodes.name: Here Comes The Dream Girl
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil welcomes the cast of an upcoming movie Dream Girl. Ayushmann Khurrana comes along with Nushrat Bharucha to start the show. Things get hilarious when Kammo Bua and other characters join in to share their time with the guests. Stay Tuned!

episodes.name: Khalnayak Of Indian Cinema
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil welcomes the true Khalnayak of Bollywood, Sanjay Dutt, and his wife, Maanyata. They have come here for the promotion of their upcoming movie Prasthanam. A while later the whole cast arrives on the stage. Sanjay Dutt and his wife share some exciting facts about each other. Stay Tuned for an entertaining evening.

episodes.name: Welcoming The Cast Of The Zoya Factor
episodes.overview: In today's episode of The Kapil Sharma Show Season 2, Kapil welcomes the lead cast of the upcoming movie 'The Zoya Factor' i.e, Sonam Kapoor Ahuja and Dulquer Salmaan. They both share various childhood memories and have lots of fun in the show. Stay tuned to know more!

episodes.name: A Night Full Of Desi Vibes
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil welcomes a famous Hindi Poet and an Emcee Dr. Kumar Vishwas. The night gets even more Desi when Manoj Bajpai and Pankaj Tripathi joins the stage. A fantastic duo, who made the cinematic universe go crazy for them to share some old but gold memories with Kapil.

episodes.name: Welcoming The Team Of Film Jhalki
episodes.overview: Today's episode begins with a sketch premise, where Chandu gets married to Bhoori and is out celebrating his honeymoon. Everything seems to go hunky-dory until their soul nemesis Rajesh Arora arrives. After their hilarious act, Kapil invites the team of the film Jhalki on stage along with Sunidhi Chauhan.

episodes.name: The Cast Of War
episodes.overview: Today's episode Kapil begins with standup and makes the atmosphere gets quite amusing. After that, he welcomes the cast of an upcoming movie War. Hrithik Roshan and Vaani Kapoor take the stage and share a brief yet wonderful time.

episodes.name: The War Continues
episodes.overview: In today's episode, some Sheikh from Dubai is trying to buy Kapil's street. In protest Chandu, Bhoori and Bachcha Yadav call the police. After this hysterical sketch, Kapil begins the conversation with Tiger Shroff. The war between Tiger and Hrithik is still going on, and Kapil is somehow managing both the guests.

episodes.name: The Sky Is Pink Today
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil receives a surprise as Bumper comes back in the show. Moments later, Kapil invites the lead cast of the movie The Sky Is Pink. Priyanka Chopra and Farhan Akhtar share a comical and hilarious night. Farhan Akhtar becomes a 'Gol Gappa' vendor today.

episodes.name: Musical Night With Padmashri Udit Narayan
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil welcomes the king of 90's music of Bollywood, Udit Narayan. Things get hysterical when his wife enters the stage and catches him flirting with Archana. A while later, Kapil welcomes Aditya Narayan and congratulates him on his new album.

episodes.name: Reliving The Old Days With Govinda And Family
episodes.overview: Today's show starts with Kapil welcoming versatile actor and one of the finest dancer of Bollywood Govinda, wife Sunita and his daughter Tina. Later singer Gajendra Verma joins the show and makes more fun. Also, Kapil congratulates them for their new song.

episodes.name: The Show Gets Housefull Tonight
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil welcomes the cast of an upcoming comedy movie, Housefull 4. Akshay Kumar, Riteish Deshmukh, Bobby Deol, and Chunky Pandey come on to the stage with some complaints about the lifestyle of Akshay and how everyone has to work accordingly.

episodes.name: Housefull Party Continues
episodes.overview: Today's episode continues with the star cast of Housefull 4 movie. But before them, Kapil shares a standup routine with the audience and asks them about the festivals of India. He welcomes Sajid Nadiadwala after his set to share a brief yet humorous evening with him. After a while, Kapil invites the glamorous lead actresses of the movie, and things get even more hilarious after that.

episodes.name: Bull's Eye With Tapsee and Bhumi
episodes.overview: Kapil Sharma starts the episode in his most celebrated avatar, that is Inspector Shamsher. Chandu and Bachha indulge in a hilarious one-on-one. Today's show is graced by Tapsee Pannu and Bhumi Pednekar to promote their upcoming film Saand Ki Aankh. Stay tuned for some rib-tickling one-liners and fantastic performances.

episodes.name: The Cast Of Made In China
episodes.overview: Kapil Sharma begins the episode with his stand-up comedy. Then he welcomes the six-pack band of Mumbai. After a stellar performance, we have the cast of Made in China, Rajkumar Rao and Mouni Roy.

episodes.name: Welcoming The Cast Of Bala
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil welcomes the lead cast of an upcoming movie Bala. Ayushmann Khurrana comes back on the show with his back to back superhit performances, along with the very beautiful and talented actresses of Bollywood, Yami Gautam, and Bhumi Padnekar. Stay Tuned for an awesome evening with some humorous and rib-tickling moments.

episodes.name: The Turbanator Of Cricket
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil welcomes Krushna's wife and a Debutant Rishaab Chauhan for their upcoming movie, Marrne Bhi Do Yaaron. After their brief interaction with Kapil, it's time to call on stage the Turbanator of Cricket, Harbhajan Singh. He comes with his wife and his cute little daughter and shares some rib-tickling moments with Kapil.

episodes.name: The Cast Of Marjaavaan
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil welcomes the cast of an upcoming movie Marjaavaan. He invites the gorgeous actresses on stage and forgets to invite the actors. Sidharth Malhotra and Riteish Deshmukh barge in angrily. The evening is full of laughter and rib-tickling moments.

episodes.name: The Cast Of Motichoor Chaknachoor
episodes.overview: Today's episode begins with Kapil performing a standup set for the audience about some funny names in India. Later, he invites the lead cast of an upcoming movie, Motichoor Chaknachoor. Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Athiya Shetty share an entertaining evening with Kapil and some rib-tickling moments from their movie.

episodes.name: A Night Full Of Pagalpanti
episodes.overview: Today's episode begins with a hilarious sketch premise, where Bachcha Yadav is expecting his son's English Teacher from school. He asks Samsher Singh to take his place and act as Kachha's father. A while later, the lead cast of Pagalpanti arrives Arshad Warsi, Anil Kapoor and John Abraham take over the show, and the evening gets hysterical after that.

episodes.name: Welcoming The Winter With Pagalpanti
episodes.overview: Kapil speaks about the arrival of winter. He also shares a few jokes and experiences about winter. Later he welcomes Mrs Divya Khosla Kumar to the set and has a great round of fun. Thereafter, The star cast and director of the upcoming movie Pagalpanti join the frolic.

episodes.name: Legendary Musicians Of This Era
episodes.overview: A musical night in The Kapil Show today, inviting the Padmashri Shankar Mahadevan, Shaan, Harshadeep Kaur, and Salim Merchant. The night is full of soulful performances and some rib-tickling experiences. Also, Chandu is back on the show and has a hysterical interaction with the guests.

episodes.name: Ustaad Wadali In The House
episodes.overview: Today's episode begins with a magical performance by Ustaad Padmashri Puranchand Wadali and his son Lakhwinder Wadali. The atmosphere of the show gets soulful by their presence and their singing.

episodes.name: The Cast Of Pati Patni Aur Woh
episodes.overview: The show begins with a sketch premise where Chappu has finally got a job as a food delivery guy. The set turns into a hilarious comedic segment when Chappu forgets to bring Bachcha's order. After that Kapil invites the lead cast of an upcoming movie, 'Pati Patni Aur Woh' on the show.

episodes.name: Welcoming The Legend Jeetendra With Tusshar Kapoor
episodes.overview: Kapil starts the show with the welcome of evergreen Bollywood star Jeetendra and his son Tushar Kapoor. Jeetendra shares many of his funny experiences and also answers to the rumors questioned by Kapil. Later Kapil creates a lot of entertainment with Tushar Kapoor as well.

episodes.name: The Star Cast Of Panipat
episodes.overview: In today's episode, the star cast of a newly released movie, Panipat, is invited to the show. Kapil welcomes the Khalnayak of Bollywood, Sanjay Dutt, to share a few interesting stories with him. Later on, Kriti Sanon and Ashutosh Gowariker join him for a humorous and entertaining evening.

episodes.name: Welcoming The Cast Of Dabangg 3
episodes.overview: Kapil starts the show with many funny questions and answers with the audiences and even they are reciting their experiences. Later Kapil welcomes the cast of Dabangg 3 i.e, Chulbul Pandey urf Salman khan, Sonakshi Sinha, and Saiee Manjrekar. Kapil enquires different rumors from the guests on behalf of the spectators and having lots of fun with them.

episodes.name: The Dabangg Stars Of Bollywood
episodes.overview: The night continues with the glamorous cast of an upcoming movie Dabangg 3. Kapil invites the producer of the film Arbaaz Khan, the director Prabhudeva and a co-star Sudeep Kichha on stage. Together they share a wonderful and joyous time. After a while, they also play the famous 'Ke Bhail Crorepati', hosted by Bachcha Yadav. Stay Tuned for a rib-tickling evening and lots of humorous moments.

episodes.name: Celebrating The 100th Episode With GOOD NEWWZ
episodes.overview: An auspicious moment for the show, as we celebrate the 100th episode with the cast of an upcoming movie, Good Newwz. Akshay Kumar picks on everyone in Kapil's team including Kapil and mocks them. For the first time this season, Kareena Kapoor Khan comes on the show, followed by the entire cast. Together they share some extremely rib-tickling moments with Kapil, and the night touches the perfect mixture of fun and emotion.

episodes.name: Colourful Night With Renowned Musicians
episodes.overview: Today's episode starts with some glorious performances by some renowned artists in the music industry. Together they have produced the music album for an upcoming movie, Good Newwz. The night is full of special moments and experiences. Each one of them shares a lovely and hysterical evening on the show. Stay Tuned for a colourful and glamorous night!

episodes.name: The Kakkar Family In The House
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Bachcha makes a new year resolution to find a suitable groom for his sister-in-law. Listening to which, Chandu presents himself as the most eligible bachelor for Bhoomi. A while later, Kapil invites the entire Kakkar family on stage. They share a wonderful and joyous evening and share some of their childhood memories with Kapil.

episodes.name: A Night Full Of Bhojpuri Superstars
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil welcomes the superstars of Bhojpuri Cinematic Universe on the stage. The famous Bhojpuri Dance number, the Lollipop song was given by the very well known, Pawan Singh. Nirahua comes riding a rickshaw along with the glamorous ladies of Bhojpuri Cinema. Stay Tuned for a 'Desi Night' and a hilarious show.

episodes.name: Welcoming The Lead Cast OF Tanhaji
episodes.overview: The show begins with standup premise where Bachcha is not ready to let his sister-in-law stay with them. The entire family comes out with their personal opinion, and the set becomes hysterical. Later, Kapil invites the lead cast of an upcoming movie, a superstar couple of Bollywood, Ajay Devgan and Kajol. They share a humorous and entertaining evening with Kapil and some everyday life experiences.

episodes.name: Special Celebrations With Deepika
episodes.overview: In today's episode, Kapil invites the lead cast of an upcoming movie, Chhapaak, Deepika Padukone on stage. The night is special as Kapil is unable to contain his feelings and keeps on flirting with Deepika. Later, we celebrate Deepika's birthday with Laxmi Agarwal and the director of the movie, Meghna Gulzar.

episodes.name: A Night With Jackie Dada
episodes.overview: Kapil welcomes one of the most legendary and charming actors of Bollywood's previous era, Jackie Shroff, on stage. The entire cast of the show is called on stage to play some games with Jackie Dada, and the show gets hysterical with its pace. At the end of the show, they dedicate a dance performance to him, which makes him relive some of his golden days from Bollywood.

episodes.name: The Googly Experts Of Indian Cricket Team
episodes.overview: The show begins with a very funny sketch performed by the entire family. Kapil welcomes two tremendously talented and brilliant players of the Indian cricket team, Piyush Chawla and Yuzvendra Chahal. Both of them are effective leg-spinners and have always performed well. Yuzvendra also talks about the two NGO's which he is attached to that helps young girls who want to pursue their career in sports.

episodes.name: A Night Full Of Panga
episodes.overview: Kapil opens the show with welcoming the actors Kangana Ranaut, Richa Chadda, etc. along with the Director of the upcoming film Panga. The guests talk about the film which is based on women kabaddi and the hurdles about their personal and professional lives. From witty commentaries to sharing funny moments, the guests enjoy the show thoroughly with Kapil and Archana. Stay Tuned to know what happens in Top Ka Adalat.

episodes.name: Swaying With The Street Dancers
episodes.overview: In today's show, Kapil very heartily welcomes Remo D'Souza, Varun Dhawan and Prabhu Deva. Later followed by the whole team of Street Dancer 3D and Shraddha Kapoor. It's a joyous and entertaining evening with everyone present. As-usual the family members have a humorous interaction with the entire cast and Remo. The show ends with Sapna dancing with Varun and Shraddha and having a fun-filled time.

episodes.name: Hungama On The Kapil Sharma Show
episodes.overview: The whole cast of Hungama 2 comes to The Kapil Sharma Show to promote their upcoming movie. Shilpa Shetty, Paresh Rawal, Rajpal Jadav, Ashutosh Rana, eat. share funny incidents related to the film and their personal and professional life which is followed by the audience speaking about whether to get married early or late. Later, at "Baat Ki Khal", the guests discuss the necessity of judges in reality shows.

episodes.name: Laughter Cruise Jaaneman
episodes.overview: Take a trudge through these laughter-full meadows to ‘The Kapil Sharma Show’. It will tickle your funny bone till the end. Take this joyous ride, as our host makes sure that the stars of ‘Jawani Jaaneman’ have a hearty laugh throughout the entire episode, and also, we learn about Saif Ali Khan’s simple side.

episodes.name: Sang Malang
episodes.overview: Once again, take a turn to the lane of laughter and fun, where Kapil Sharma will meet today our stars of ‘Malang’ to tickle them with his humour till the end. Where, in a quiz, our beloved stars will affirm some truths about themselves and will clear the rumour, and in the end Dhwani Bhanushali will perform a song for us to savour.

episodes.name: Thirty Years Of Aashiqui
episodes.overview: In today’s exciting episode Kapil Sharma invites Rahul Roy, Anu Aggarwal, and Deepak Tijori to celebrate thirty years of Aashiqui’s release. They tell him how they got the roles, how their lives changed after the success, and how their characters name in ‘Aashiqui’ are the same as their real names. The Aashiqui’s cast makes the audience laugh with humorous incidents in the film. Kapil tells Rahul how everyone in India became a lover after watching Aashiqui. What impact it had on India’s moviegoers. The laughter becomes uncontrollable when Sapna and others arrive and crack their unique jokes. Also, Kapil Sharma shows his singing talents.

episodes.name: Kartik’s Love Aaj Kal
episodes.overview: In this episode Kapil welcomes the superstars of the Movie ‘Love Aaj Kal’ to the stage. Kapil challenges Kartik to lift Archana. He succeeds and then pretends to fall on the floor. Kartik and Sara then talk about the trending kartik hashtag on the twitter. They also discuss about their gym life. Kartik tells Kapil that he loves dancing. Kapil claims he can dance well too, just in his mind. Kartik then talks about his love life. He discusses how difficult it was for him to meet his girlfriend in school. Then Kapil asks Kartik and Sara whether they ever had lice in their hair. Sara admits to having lice once while Kartik tells he had lice many times. The laughter dose increases even more when Kammo Bua arrives and starts flirting with Kartik’s father. After that Kartik and Sara play a guess game and Kapil encourages the audience to share their valentine story.

episodes.name: Is Kapil Ayushmann’s Lucky Charm?
episodes.overview: Kapil Sharma welcomes the star cast of “Shubh Mangal Zyada Saavdhan” on the show. Kapil asks Ayushmann if his show is lucky for him as his previous films were successful because Ayushmann promoted them on his show. On the other hand, Jitendra also confesses that he only signed the film to be on Kapil’s Show. After a while, Kiku Sarda dressed as a hip hopper compares Ayushmann to Shaktiman, he also asks Jitendra whether he got paid for the movie or he just had to make do with likes, shares, and subscribes as a form of payment. After a while, audiences interacts with the star cast. Kapil also dances with one of the audience members. Kapil later on, asks the stars to confirm some of the rumours. Whereas Krishna dressed as Sapna gives vermilion to Ayushmann and asks him to use it on Jitendra. The show ends with Ayushmann singing a song from his movie.

episodes.name: Vicky And "Bhoot Part 1, The Haunted Ship"
episodes.overview: This episode starts with a hilarious comedy sketch of Kapil and his team. After a while, Vicky Kaushal appears on the show to promote his film “Bhoot Part 1, The Haunted Ship”. Kapil interacts with Vicky about the film and his fears in general. Later on, Krushna appears on the stage and entertains Vicky with her goofiness and tries to flirt with him. Finally, the show ends with Sumona trying to scare Vicky.

episodes.name: Kapil Is India’s Best Dancer
episodes.overview: Today’s episode starts with the usual bang, where Kapil and Archana pull each other’s leg. Kapil then invites the judges of India’s Best Dancers on the stage; Geeta Kapoor, Malaika Arora, Terence Lewis. Kapil then asks them they already have a dance show, Super Dancers, why there’s a need for another. Geeta explains that was for kids and this is for teenagers. Archana makes fun of Kapil’s waistline. Kapil and the guest judges then crack few jokes and pull each other’s legs. Geeta also shares that how everyone starts addressing her as ‘Ma’. At that moment, Kapil jokes and asks Archana Puran Singh that how did she become a father. Then Kapil does a funny question and answers round. Then Sumona arrives and tries to become the India’s Best Dancers’ Show’s host, but Kapil can’t stop himself from teasing her. The laughter continues when the Dance Show’s host, Bharti arrives and tickles everyone’s funny bones. Kapil and Geeta Kapoor then do a funny imitation of airplane announcement.

episodes.name: Kapil’s Sensational Thappad
episodes.overview: Kapil Sharma starts the show with quirky and interesting take on history. He then takes a fun quiz on history with the audience. Later, he invites Taapsee Pannu on stage. Kapil asks Taapsee why her films’ titles are of single words, is it because she is single? He cracks a few more jokes with her and afterwards, invites another actror Diya Mirza and Thappad’s Director Anubhav Sinha. Kapil flirts with Diya by saying that she looks good in the black saree and jokingly calls Archana Bulgaria’s parrot. Kapil can’t stop flirting with Diya, to which Diya asks him whether he knows the film’s title or not? Kapil then does a Yes & No session with both the actors and the director. Then Chandu arrives unexpectedly with his own fashion show and the laughter doubles. Later, Chandu invites Bhoori, the fashion designer on the stage, hoping she will take his side, but they both end up pulling each other’s leg. Chandu leaves and Bhoori shows ‘Thappad’s’ star cast her fashion collection.

episodes.name: Tiger Shroff’s Singing Skills
episodes.overview: Kapil welcomes Tiger Shroff and Shraddha Kapoor for the promotion of “Baaghi 3”. He asks Tiger whether to reduce his intake of sugar or to reduce some romance in life to stay fit like him. Then, Kapil invites Ahmed Khan and Ritesh Deshmukh on the stage. Both of them enter on the stage with their awesome dance moves. Kapil tells Ritesh that he is his biggest fan. He also compliments Tiger for being an Indian action hero. Ritesh confesses that he wore Genelia’s shirt for a scene. Then, Kiku appears on the stage and entertains the guests with his unique promotion style. He asks Tiger if his body got tanned while shooting in the sun. Ahmed tells everybody that the film contains 85% real stunts and 15% VFX. Shraddha and Tiger showcase their dance performance on the stage. Ritesh compliments Ahmed for his various talents and both of them, entertain everyone with their mimicking skills as well. Everyone requests Tiger to sing a song.

episodes.name: Ramayan’s 33 Years, Cast Celebrates
episodes.overview: The cast of late Ramanand Sagar’s iconic serial Ramayana reunites to celebrate the 33 years of its airing. Kapil Sharma invites Arun Govil (Ram), Dipika (Sita) and Sunil Lahri (Lakman) with huge applause from the audience. Kapil goes nostalgic as he shares his first meeting with Arun Govil. Meanwhile, Arun reveals that his first audition was rejected by Sagar for the role of Shri Ram. Dipika and Sunil also share about how they were finalized to play their roles. Further, Arun narrates how he was abused by a man for smoking a cigarette, as they considered him God. Dipika shares how she realized after two-three months of Ramayan airing, that she and Arun were being revered by senior citizens too. Kiku Sharda and Bharti Singh’s humorous act leaves the cast in splits. Later, Prem Sagar, son of Ramanand Sagar arrives and launches the biography of his visionary father titled ‘An Epic Life: Ramanand Sagar, From Barsaat to Ramayan’ written by him.

episodes.name: Women’s Day With The Devi’s
episodes.overview: The occasion of Women’s Day just gets more special, as Kajol and Shruti Hassan arrive for the promotion of their short film Devi. Kapil wishes them a Happy Women’s Day, and congratulates Kajol on the blockbuster success of her last release Tanhaji. Kajol talks about Devi, which is based on a sensitive social cause, and feels that it should bring the required change and touch everyone from within. Meanwhile, Kapil invites the other cast members of the film, which includes Mukta Barve, Neena Kulkarni, Shivani Raghuvanshi and Yashaswini Dayama. Feeling that his show hasn’t looked so glamorous before, Kapil gets a photo session done with them. Further, Yashaswini croons Love You Zindagi, and Shruti also entertains with singing Alvida song beautifully. The cast even plays an extremely funny game. Later, Kajol reveals an interesting incident about misleading the media persons on the day of her wedding. The fun quotient adds up with Kajol shaking a leg with Bharti on Bole Chudiyaan.

episodes.name: Akshay Kumar’s Early Morning Fun
episodes.overview: Kapil Sharma wishes everyone a very Good Morning, as they’re shooting for this episode at 6 am in the morning. Kapil reveals the reason behind this early shooting is none other than their guest, superstar Akshay Kumar. He welcomes Akshay, who comes to promote his film Sooryavanshi. Akshay shares that there are many complaints against him of waking up so early for promotions. Then, Akshay recommends some artists to Kapil and shows everyone some funny morphed pictures of Chunky Pandey, Riteish Deshmukh, Saurabh Shukla, and Boman Irani. Meanwhile, Akshay tells something about award functions, which evokes laughter. They invite Sooryavanshi director Rohit Shetty, who arrives and says that he wishes to take over the judge’s chair from Archana Puran Singh. Rohit shares that Akshay didn’t wear the safety harness while shooting for the Helicopter scene in the film. Akshay shower praises on the Police, who sacrifice their lives for everyone. Later, Katrina Kaif is welcomed by Kapil.

episodes.name: Double The Fun With Team Sooryavanshi
episodes.overview: Kapil Sharma’s dose of entertainment continues with team Sooryavanshi. Kapil starts the show with a hilarious act, where he’s dressed up as a Police Inspector. Kapil then invites producer Karan Johar, and congratulates him for being awarded the prestigious Padma Shri. Karan compliments Kapil that he’s looking hot. Karan later shares about what makes him and Rohit Shetty come together for entertainers like Simmba and Sooryavanshi. Upon being asked whether he is more talented or flexible, Karan replies with a witty answer. Meanwhile, Karan says that he shouldn’t post any new ‘videos’ now. Rohit and Karan then share how Kareena Kapoor Khan gets to know about everything that is happening in Bollywood. Hearing about these incidents about Bebo, Akshay suggests that Mumbai Police should hire Kareena. Then, Kapil plays a game with Karan, where he has to recite some popular Police dialogues from Hindi films.

episodes.name: Dream Girl Returns
episodes.overview: Kapil Sharma invites Esha Deol on the show. He compliments her that she is looking very pretty and congratulates her on her debut book Amma Mia’s launch. Esha talks about the book and her two daughters, Radhya and Miraya, who inspired her to write the book. Continuing with the chat, Kapil then invites Esha’s mother and Bollywood’s Dream Girl, Hema Malini on stage. Hema then shares tips of being fit and reveals that as a kid, Esha was the naughtiest. Meanwhile, Hema narrates how she convinced Dharmendra to let Esha act in films. Later, Hema and Esha go on a nostalgic trip looking at some old pictures of Esha and Ahana along with their parents. Hema also shares how and when she got the title of ‘Dream Girl’ in films. Esha then Kapil to sing a song, and he beautifully croons Hema’s classic romantic number Humein Tumse Pyar Kitna. Sapna, Baccha Yadav and Titli Yadav entertain with their hilarious acts. Towards the end, Hema and Esha launch the book Amma Mia on the show.

episodes.name: The Devdas Unfolds On Kapil’s Show
episodes.overview: Bhoori rocks the stage with her dance performance but Shamsher Singh interrupts and interrogates her. Meanwhile, enters Baccha, who has decided to direct Devdas, the Bengali classic. Eventually, Shamsher, who’s playing Devdas gets bored and decides to portray a Punjabi Devdas. What will this Punjabi Devdas be like? Later, Sai Manjrekar and Ayush Sharma visit the show to promote their new single, Manjha. In a warm tete-a-tete with Kapil, they open up about their Bollywood journey so far.

episodes.name: Kapil Becomes Yamraj
episodes.overview: The episode starts on a musical note. Kapil beautifully croons classic songs, Inteha Ho Gayi Intezar Ki and Kisi Ki Muskurahaton Pe Ho Nisar. Kapil starts entertaining with his funny jokes about a new born baby. Meanwhile, a funny act on Yamlok brings the house down with laughter. Kapil becomes Yamraj and solves the confusion of a newly deceased on whether he should enter the Swarg Lok or Narak Lok. Kapil as Yamraj, tells everyone to use sanitizer, spreading awareness on Coronavirus.

episodes.name: Kapil’s Wonderful Audience
episodes.overview: In this episode, Kapil Sharma speaks with his audience and learns some interesting things about them. He entertains them with his quirky one liners. He also plays some funny games with the audience and makes them happy.

episodes.name: Back And How!
episodes.overview: Enjoy your favourite The Kapil Sharma Show once again. Kapil and his madhouse is back in action and you don’t want to miss it for anything. Watch Kapil connect with his fans distantly. And also get thoroughly entertained with a hilarious, yet realistic skit by the performers.

episodes.name: Entertainment Unleashed!
episodes.overview: Sonu Sood, has stolen millions of hearts with his acting, but more for his philanthropy. On The Kapil Sharma Show in this episode, Sonu talks to Kapil about his experience with the migrant workers. Also, enjoy the entertaining acts by our quirky host Kapil and the team.

episodes.name: Life, Off-Screen!
episodes.overview: Kapil and his team are working together for a long, and they all are like one big family. Let’s meet with the spouses of these family members. This weekend, Kapil interacts with Parmeet Sethi, Priyanka Sharda, and Kashmira Shah on their marriage and love life.

episodes.name: Mission Laughter
episodes.overview: Kapil Sharma welcomes Team Avrodh: The Siege Within actors - Amit Sadh, Neeraj Kabi, Madhurima Tuli, and Darshan Kumaar on the show. Kapil interacts with the stars about the web show. Later, they all play a funny game and enjoy some interesting revelations. Plus, adding to the fun are the hilarious acts by the gang.

episodes.name: The Entertaining Brothers
episodes.overview: The Independence Day celebration gets exciting on The Kapil Sharma Show as the music composer duo Salim–Sulaiman makes a rocking entry with the song Chak De India. They share some interesting facts while the hilarious acts of Sapna and Accha Yadav take the entertainment factor notches higher.

episodes.name: The Laughter Loots
episodes.overview: Hop on to a crazy laughter ride with Kapil Sharma as he engages in a conversation with the Lootcase actors, Ranveer Shorey, Kunal Khemu, and Rasika Duggal. Their quick comebacks to Kapil’s funny questions are sure to have you splitting into your sides. Catch this high-on-entertainment episode of The Kapil Sharma Show to know more about the movie Lootcase and much more.

episodes.name: Mika, Shefali And Chahatt Raise The Hotness Bar!
episodes.overview: The hotness bar reaches an all-new level on The Kapil Sharma Show, as the singing star, Mika Singh, and two sexy divas, Shefali and Chahatt, joins Kapil. Mika Paji not only entertains us with his all-time popular chartbusters but also gets chatty with Kapil on various topics like his song, Jumme Ki Raat. Hilarious acts by Mitti Mouse and Bua take the entertainment to an all-new level.

episodes.name: Your Honor Haazir Ho!
episodes.overview: The fun quotient on The Kapil Sharma Show increases in this episode as Kapil welcomes the Your Honor actors, Jimmy Sheirgill, Mita Vasisht, and Varun Badola. With Kapil’s tongue-in-cheek questions and witty replies by the celebs, this is a crazy laughter ride that you must not miss.

episodes.name: Welcome, Covid-19 Warriors!
episodes.overview: This weekend, our favourite host, Kapil Sharma has very special guests on the show. Let’s meet Dr. Muffazal Lakdawala and Dr. Gautam Bhansali, the doctors who have poured their sweat and blood to treat the Covid-19 patients despite the risk of getting infected. Watch their mind-blowing interactions with Kapil and the team in this wonderful episode. Check out their inspiring journey through the pandemic right now!

episodes.name: The Zingaat Entertainment
episodes.overview: Conquering millions of hearts with their melodious and foot-tapping music, composer duo, Ajay-Atul makes a Zingaat entry, as our host, Kapil Sharma welcomes them to celebrate Ganesh Mahotsav. Ajay-Atul talks about their love for music since childhood and shares many more interesting facts while treating us to a humorous conversation with our quirky host, Kapil and his laughter gang. Plus, the duo sings Deva Shree Ganesha adding much more fun to the Ganpati celebrations.

episodes.name: Teen Geetkaar Bane Kapil Ke Yaar
episodes.overview: The entertainment mode on The Kapil Sharma Show turns lyrical, as celebrated lyricists Swanand Kirkire, Amitabh Bhattacharya, and Manoj Muntashir, join our favourite host. Kapil starts asking them some funny questions which leave the guests in splits. Plus, the hilarious acts by Baccha Yadav and Mitti Mouse take the fun to a new level. Join the Kapil gang to have some musical fun and get to know some funny secrets and the hidden talent of our guests.

episodes.name: Hansi Ki Bauchhar With Angad-Neha
episodes.overview: Our host, Kapil Sharma, engages in a conversation with Bollywood’s power couple, Angad Bedi and Neha Dhupia. Kapil’s hilarious questions on marriage and lockdown secrets get the couple to be at their wittiest best, followed by a romantic moment between the two. Plus, Bachcha Yadav’s bank becomes a house of comedy, with each customer’s crazy quirks and antics.

episodes.name: Comedy Ki Raat Sachin-Jigar Aur Diyva Ke Saath
episodes.overview: Promising lots of music, fun, and entertainment, our host, Kapil Sharma welcomes the rocking music composer duo, Sachin-Jigar, and singer, Divya Kumar. From asking the guests some funny questions to giving an audition to Sachin-Jigar for playback singing, everything results in unlimited laughter. The guests even join in for an entertaining game of ‘Never Have I Ever’. Also, do not forget to catch Sapna’s punny act with Jigar, which will leave you in splits.

episodes.name: Kadak Bhojpuri Entertainment With Manoj-Ravi
episodes.overview: The entertainment bar reaches an all-new level as Bhojpuri superstars, Ravi Kishan and Manoj Tiwari join Kapil. The duo’s banter while giving witty answers to Kapil’s questions is unmissable. From Krushna’s ace act as Big B and Bachcha Yadav’s top-notch comical punches, this episode has it all. And what’s even more fun is the enactment of some cricketing moves by Manoj and Ravi.

episodes.name: Richa-Harshdeep’s Unlimited Masti
episodes.overview: Kapil Sharma invites two outstanding singers, Richa Sharma and Harshdeep Kaur, promising a high-on-entertainment ride. With some interesting revelations about Richa’s childhood mischiefs to Harshdeep getting a wedding proposal at Gurudwara, the guests get chatty with Kapil and enjoy their time on the show. Plus, the talented duo’s singing along with Kapil, and Sapna’s special massage makes it all the more necessary to watch this hilarious episode.

episodes.name: Ashutosh-Renuka, Couple Goals Ki Paribhasha
episodes.overview: Kapil Sharma welcomes one of Bollywood’s most ideal couples, Ashutosh Rana and Renuka Shahane. Kapil’s questions about Renuka falling in love with Ashutosh, Ashutosh’s writing, Renuka’s first visit to Ashutosh’s set, and much more, get the couple to be at their wittiest best. Renuka showcases her hidden talent and sings a romantic number for Ashutosh. Plus, Bachcha and Titli’s banter makes Renuka wish if she and Ashutosh were a couple like them.

episodes.name: Annu Kappor, The Harfanmaula Kalakar
episodes.overview: Mention Annu Kapoor, one instantly remembers the Antakshari days and Sapna brings back those memories during her chit chat with this legendary actor who made waves even as a show anchor. Annu ji, in his full swag and style, reveals a lot of his life’s secrets. Matching Kapil’s comedy moves he wows us with his soulful singing and infectious energy. Watch this episode to know a fine actor, a perfect stage anchor, and a lovely human being - Annu Kapoor.

episodes.name: Mahabharat Ke Kamaal Kisse
episodes.overview: The show tonight looks grand as some of the mega stars of the mega serial Mahabharat grace the show. The actors share funny and interesting stories, lesser-known facts come to light. Did you know casting director ‘Shakuni’ took 3500 auditions for over two years to finalise the cast? How did Nitish Bharadwaj learn the ‘Arjun’ dialogues? And not to forget the goofy, Punjabi-speaking ‘Hanuman’!

episodes.name: Hasi Mazak ‘Hum Log’on Ke Saath
episodes.overview: It’s a Hum Log cast reunion after 36 years and masti unlimited is guaranteed. Bachcha Yadav brings his infectious laughter dose and a Hum Log monologue of his childhood days. Divya Seth shares her birthday with Kapil and may replace Archana by her signature laughter. Rajesh Puri gets a chhole gift? Seema did real social work for 3 years based on her screen role. Did Manoj date Majhli on screen and Badki off screen? There’s Lallu’s dacoit photoshoot and many more Hum Log tales.

episodes.name: Anubhav’s Blackmailing Tactics For Manoj
episodes.overview: Great buddies Manoj Bajpai and Anubhav Sinha - have stories galore to share. Anubhav’s blackmail funda for Manoj or Manoj’s jibe at stingy Anubhav. While Manoj’s happy hour in a Paris bound flight was incredible, Anubhav confesses to having rejected many movies due to his average acting skills. What took 26 years for the buddy duo to collaborate for work? And when they did, something fabulous like ‘Bambai Mein Ka Ba’ came out. Stay tuned to Bachcha’s Raddi News. Is Sidhu back? But where is Kapil?

episodes.name: Fun Overdose On Sony’s 25th Anniversary
episodes.overview: As Sony TV turns 25, Kapil brings together a special episode to celebrate this silver jubilee. The entire cast share their best wishes for the channel and as usual, do not shy away from leg-pulling. Add to that, Indian Idol’s famed singer - Salman Ali’s melody, nakli Sidhu Paaji’s dhamaal, Bachchan sahab’s grandeur, Sunny’s dhai kilo ka haath, and much more. Enjoy this super funny episode to see the team’s antics.

episodes.name: Beautiful Poonam,  Gorgeous Padmini
episodes.overview: A huge shout out to the two beautiful Bollywood divas, who ruled hearts in the 80's era. They are none other than buddies, Poonam Dhillon and Padmini Kolhapure. When the duo catch up, fun, banter and meethi shararat go up by a notch. While Padmini is concerned about Kapil losing weight, Poonam complains that he isn't flirting enough with her. The best part is when Padmini says that Jackie Shroff used to flirt the most, and in walks Jaggu dada. Lastly, Padmini sings so well, wow!

episodes.name: Siblings Shararat With Huma And Saqib
episodes.overview: Fine actor Huma Qureshi is on the show with her younger brother, Saqib. Huma wanted to be an actress from her childhood, Saqib followed suit. Saqib was photographed as a child, dressed in Huma’s ghagra. Did you know Huma just completed a film with Akshay Kumar even amidst pandemic? Huma addresses Kapil as her brother, he forgets his lines in turn! Saqib was the greedy one. Huma once hit Saqib very hard and then panicked like crazy.

episodes.name: Shatrughan Sinha, Beyond Khamosh
episodes.overview: Better known for his action roles, Shotgun Sinha, today seems to be in his unplugged avatar, thanks to Kapil. From his marriage proposal story to being referred to as Shatur-murg, Mr. Sinha bares it all. His Khamosh still rings fresh after years. Did you know that Shatru ji used to deliver his scenes without retakes? What happened when he forgot his wife’s birthday? Son, Luv Sinha loves his action movies over romance.

episodes.name: Divalicious Nora, Dapper Guru
episodes.overview: Nora Fatehi and Guru Randhawa are an absolute delight to watch on The Kapil Sharma Show. Kapil gets all flirty with Nora and asks her to be a part of his web series. Guru Randhawa spins the magic of vocals and gets everyone swaying to his tunes. Meanwhile, Shona and Baabu approach Nora to do their homework, and shake a leg with Guru and Nora. Kapil’s band gets belly dancing lessons from Nora and Guru talks about how he taught Nora some cool Bhangra.

episodes.name: Jodi Kamaal: Genelia And Riteish
episodes.overview: After dating for ten long years, they wedded and today, Riteish and Genelia rock the show with their laughter tales. Watch out Riteish’s funda for pheras and shapaths for a wedding. Top it with Krushna’s Himalaya comedy, to complete the laughter scene. Answering a fan, Riteish confesses that he always says sorry to Genelia during their arguments. Genelia, in turn, gets to ask only ten questions to her hubby per day.

episodes.name: Suresh Raina, Beyond Cricket
episodes.overview: Suresh Raina, the skilled cricketer is in his fun avatar along with his wife, Priyanka. Suresh and Priyanka's child was born on the day lockdown started. Thus, Priyanka steps out of the house after ten months, thanks to Kapil's invitation. Suresh tried his hands at household chores during lockdown. Interestingly, Priyanka’s father was Suresh’s cricket coach. Was this a prelude to their wedding? Ever thought what do the cricketers’ wives do if their better halves don't score well? Keep watching.

episodes.name: Laughter Crackers By Team Laxmii
episodes.overview: The much awaited movie, Laxmii's star cast, Akshay Kumar and Kiara Advani, are here, and oh, what fun! From signature steps of ‘Burj Khalifa’ to holding an adalat, the duo does it all, with unfiltered fun and masti. Amid laughter bouts, team Kapil Sharma also has gifts for Akshay, to celebrate his silver jubilee. Watch out for the saree task and Kiara’s singing. The real life Laxmi joins the show and voices a strong message on behalf of the transgender community’s acceptance in society.

episodes.name: Bulk Masti With Remo’s Gang
episodes.overview: Remo brings his dance gang to the show and they talk about the making of the music video, Log Kya Kahenge, along with their other lockdown stories. Remo today is a trendsetter to those who thought dancing ain’t no good as a career. Amid Kapil’s non-stop humour, Punit gets a baraat wala rehearsal for his wedding, which is round the corner. While Sapna’s Garmi step is drool worthy, Bumper has found a match in Dharmesh!

episodes.name: Chhalaang Stars In The House!
episodes.overview: It’s Diwali with Rajkummar and Nushrratt, and their upcoming movie, Chhalaang. The actors give out movie’s little sneak peeks. When Rajkummar comes to ask for Titli’s rishta, there’s total madness around. Was Nushrratt Bhuri’s college mate? Rajkummar ran away to Mumbai for Boogie Woogie and used to sit outside Shah Rukh Khan’s house. Today he mimics SRK like a pro. Later, actor-director, Divya Khosla Kumar and Singer, Darshan Raval join in, to complete the fun scene.

episodes.name: Back To School With Alisha-Jassi-Neeraj
episodes.overview: On the auspicious occasion of Diwali, Kapil Sharma invites three talented pop singers, Alisha Chinai, Jassi Jasbir and Neeraj Shridhar on the show. While Alisha, Jassi and Neeraj take us back to the wonderful memories of the 90’s, Baccha and team make sure to entertain the guests with their epic performances. Later, Kapil surprises his audience with a Diwali bonus, as he welcomes Scam 1992 stars, Pratik Gandhi, Shreya Dhanwanthary and Hansal Mehta, on the show.

episodes.name: Comedy Maahol With Govinda
episodes.overview: It ought to be a bundle of laughs, when Kapil Sharma invites the king of comedy, Govinda, on his show. With his famous comic timing, Govinda gets super-candid with Kapil and spills some interesting beans about his co-workers. While Govinda creates a maahol with his unfiltered chit-chats, Bachcha brings his new friends to entertain the comedy king.

episodes.name: Comedy Trip With Indian Idol Trio
episodes.overview: The Indian Idol trio, Aditya, Himesh and Vishal, make a musical entry, with their super hit songs. The guests open up about the various quirky incidents that have happened during their stage shows. Aditya is all set to marry his childhood love and Himesh is enjoying his newly married life, Vishal being a lifetime bachelor. Few shortlisted singers of Indian Idol also show their talent. Know about Himesh’s first film song break, Bumper’s Aditya love and much more in this episode.

episodes.name: Qisson Ki Mehfil With Shakti-Chunky
episodes.overview: The legendary Bollywood superstars, Shakti Kapoor and Chunky Panday, grace The Kapil Sharma Show with their wonderful presence. Wasting no time, they both get pretty candid and start to spill some beans about each other. As Shakti and Chunky’s hilarious banter continues, Chandu and Bhuri, from BhuChand academy, perform a twisted tale of Devdas in front of them. Later, Sapna gets on the stage and makes sure to entertain Shakti and Chunky at the fullest.

episodes.name: Anupam Kher, Satish Kuashik, Pankaj Tripathi On Kapil’s Show
episodes.overview: The entertainment quotient is high on The Kapil Sharma Show, as our favourite host invites the seasoned actors, Anupam Kher, Satish Kaushik and Pankaj Tripathi, on the stage. Anupam and Satish speak about their friendship, and pull each other’s legs, while Pankaj Tripathi joins them to promote his upcoming film, Kaagaz. Later, Bachcha Yadav, with his Bhaisa, enters the stage to entertain our guests with hilarious one-liners.

episodes.name: From Struggle To Stardom, Nawazuddin Siddiqui
episodes.overview: The entertainment factor on The Kapil Sharma Show will reach a new level tonight, as our cherished host invites Nawazuddin Siddiqui on the stage. While Bumper and Sapna regale Nawazuddin with their quirky feats, Nawaz talks about his days of struggle and gives a glimpse into his personal life.

episodes.name: Nehu-Preet, Shaadi Ke Baad Pehli Baar
episodes.overview: Neha Kakkar Singh graces the show with her dearest hubby, Rohanpreet Singh. As non-stop laughter and romance is in the air, Nehu-Preet light up the stage like never before. Their subtle teasing and cute flirtations make the day. Kapil and Archana are awed by the lovebirds. Last but not the least, our comedy stars steal the show like every time. Watch the newly-weds relive some shaadi ki rasmein and have a total blast, followed by Tulsi Kumar’s stunning performance for the evening.

episodes.name: Team Durgamati’s Savage Comedy Eve
episodes.overview: What happens when the team of a horror thriller arrives on The Kapil Sharma Show? Tune in tonight as the amazing cast of Durgamati will grace the show and share some witty, hilarious and spooky stories with us. Arshad’s timeless comical puns, Bhumi’s relatable stories, Mahie and Karan’s sporting humour coupled with a rib-tickling QandA round and some funny gags with Kiku and Krushna, is bound to add loads of chuckles and laughter to your evening.

episodes.name: Indian Cricket Team’s Rising Stars
episodes.overview: Did you know that Nitish Rana is Krushna’s brother-in-law? Or the reason behind Axar’s unique name? Tonight’s show will be a box full of revelations, when IPL’s four shining stars, Nitish Rana, Ravi Bishnoi, Rahul Tewatia, and Axar Patel, will grace the stage to play an innings they have never played before. They won’t only relish the shenanigans of the hosts, but will also discuss their inspiring cricket journey.

episodes.name: Frolic With The Singing Star, Sukhwinder
episodes.overview: The man with a velvety voice, Sukhwinder Singh, is all set to wow Kapil and the audience with his super-hit songs, amidst non-stop laughter and frolic. The masti multiplies when Sukhwinder enjoys the funny antics of Kapil’s entertaining team. Kapil digs into many secrets of the singing superstar and is left speechless with Sukhi paa ji’s hilarious stories. Do not miss Sukhwinder Singh’s soul-touching performance, tonight on The Kapil Sharma Show.

episodes.name: Unfiltered Masti With The Dance Masters
episodes.overview: The masti multiplies when the acclaimed choreographers, Geeta Kapur, Ganesh Acharya and Terence Lewis grace The Kapil Sharma Show with their wonderful presence. There is Ganesh’s weight loss journey, Geeta-Kapil’s flirtatious conversation and Terence’s laughter peals. Add to that Accha’s boisterous gags and Nakli Jaggu Dada’s dancing feet, to get a perfect evening of fun and entertainment.

episodes.name: Coolie No. 1 Ka Christmas Celebration
episodes.overview: This Christmas season, Kapil Sharma invites Varun Dhawan and Sara Ali Khan on the show to promote their latest film, Coolie No. 1. While Varun and Alia get into a highly engrossing conversation with Kapil, Bhuri and Chandu from the famous BhuChand Academy showcase their extraordinary talent before the actors. Later, Kiku and Krushna as the mischievous school kids get on the stage to tickle Varun and Sara’s funny bones with their hilarious jokes.

episodes.name: Comedy Mehfil With Team Coolie No. 1
episodes.overview: The entertainment quotient intensifies on The Kapil Sharma Show, as the entire star cast of Coolie No. 1, joins Varun Dhawan and Sara Ali Khan for a magical evening. While Johnny Lever, Jaaved Jaaferi and Rajpal Yadav make the audience laugh with their chucklesome stories, Jackky Bhagnani, Shikha Talsania and Sahil Vaid share their bizarre experiences in the film industry.

episodes.name: Kapil's Double Guestlist
episodes.overview: Kapil has a special surprise for today's episode.Two set of incredibly talented guests. The cast of Ramprasad Ki Tehrvi and SonyLIV's show Sandwiched Forever. Watch as stars like Konkona Sen Sharma, Kunaal Roy Kapur, Manoj Pahwa and Seema Pahwa take the stage.

episodes.name: New Year Celebration With Anil Kapoor
episodes.overview: New Year celebration becomes more special as our loving host invites renowned star, Anil Kapoor as the special guest, who talks about his upcoming movie, AK vs AK. Tune in to learn Anil Kapoor's secrets behind looking young and dashing. The immensely entertaining Sarla, Titli, Chandu and Baccha Yadav make us laugh till we cry. Watch this super amusing episode of The Kapil Sharma Show only on SonyLIV.

episodes.name: Punjabi Special With Badshah And Sukhbir
episodes.overview: Kapil welcomes two of the biggest stars in the Hindi music industry, Badshah and Sukhbir to turn the show into an all-out dance party. Entertainment and laughter are guaranteed as the two musical giants meet and interact with all the other characters of the show.

episodes.name: The Big Bull Stars Ki Raat
episodes.overview: Abhishek Bachchan, Ajay Devgn, Sohum Shah and Nikita Dutta, the star cast of the movie, The Big Bull have graced the stage with their presence. The excitement level is at its peak on the set. Our charming host gets flirty with Nikita Dutta while Ajay and Abhishek pull his leg.

episodes.name: The Cast Of Jassi Jaissi Koi Nahi
episodes.overview: The cast of the popular T.V show from the mid 2000's, Jassi Jaisi Koi Nahi, grace Kapil's Stage. Mona Singh, Gaurav Gera, Virendra Saxena and Samir Soni tell us stories about their lives.

episodes.name: The Evergreen Raj Babbar and Jaya Prada
episodes.overview: Kapil hosts veteran actors Raj Babbar and Jaya Prada and other cast members, including Gurpreet Ghuggi and Ihana Dhillon, of the upcoming picture Bhoot Uncle: Tussi Great Ho. Join Kapil and family who interview their guests while entertaining everyone.

episodes.name: Villain’s Day Out
episodes.overview: Stars who have contributed immensely to Indian film industry with their negative roles over the years, come as guests on Kapil's Show. Legends Bindu, Ranjeet, and Gulshan Grover give us an insight into what it was like to be a loved and hated icon during their days of glory.

episodes.name: Greatest Musicians Of All Time!
episodes.overview: Three singing legends and winners of the Padmashree award, Pankaj Udhas, Anup Jhalota and Hariharan, arrive as guests at Kapil's show. They grace the stage with their mesmerizing voices and leave us awe-struck.

episodes.name: Cast Of Wagle Ki Duniya and Mehendi Wale Haath
episodes.overview: We have the cast of Wagle Ki Duniya which makes a comeback on all platforms after 33 years. The critically acclaimed sitcom from the late '80s, has a new take on modern problems. Originally written and created by legendary cartoonist R.K Laxman, the show uniquely captures every emotion of Indian middle-class life. In our next segment, we have Guru Randhawa and Sanjana Sanghi tell us about their new song 'Mehendi Waale Haath'.Also, will it be Shamsher's lucky day with Ridhima Pandit?

episodes.name: Cast Of Bhuj On The Kapil Sharma Show
