episodes.name: CCL Ke Sitarey
episodes.overview: The star players of the Celebrity Cricket League arrive on The Kapil Sharma Show for a night filled with unlimited laughter and entertainment.

episodes.name: A Star Studded Evening
episodes.overview: Filmmaker Sudhir Mishra, Ritwik Bhowmik, Parambrata Chatterjee and Harshita Gaur make a stellar entry as they promote their show 'Jehanabad - Of Love and War' followed by The Great Khali, Suniel Shetty, Mahavir Singh Phogat, Ritu Phogat and Mohamedali Budhwani who are here to promote their upcoming MMA reality series 'Kumite 1 Warrior Hunt' and enjoy an evening full of fun, games and laughter.

episodes.name: The Entertainers Tour On Kapil's Show
episodes.overview: Akshay Kumar, Mouni Roy, Nora Fatehi, Sonam Bajwa and Disha Patani bring the ultimate dose of entertainment on The Kapil Sharma Show.

episodes.name: Ek Jhoothi Aur Makkaar Shaam
episodes.overview: Ranbir Kapoor, Shraddha Kapoor and Anubhav Singh Bassi grace the stage of The Kapil Sharma Show as they laugh and have fun with Kapil and team promoting their upcoming film 'Tu Jhoothi Main Makkaar'.

episodes.name: Gulmohar Waali Shaam
episodes.overview: Legendary actress Sharmila Tagore, Manoj Bajpayee, Simran Rishi Bagga, Suraj Sharma and Rahul Chittella spend an evening of love and laughter as they promote their film 'Gulmohar'.

episodes.name: Zwigato On The Kapil Sharma Show
episodes.overview: Abdu Rozik gives a special appearance and Raju welcomes the director of 'Zwigato' Nandita Das, and actors Shahana Goswami and Kapil Sharma for a fun-filled evening.

episodes.name: Bheed Ki Team Se Mulaqat
episodes.overview: The cast of the upcoming film 'Bheed', Rajkummar Rao, Kritika Kamra, Bhumi Pednekar, Ashutosh Rana, Dia Mirza Rekhi and director Anubhav Sinha make an entry on Kapil's show and enjoy the evening.

episodes.name: Social Media Ke Sitare
episodes.overview: Kapil invites MC Stan, Bhuvan Bam, Harsh Gujral and Dolly Singh to appreciate all the talent that has entertained the masses through social media.

episodes.name: The Babbar Family
episodes.overview: Kapil welcomes Raj Babbar and his sons, Aarya and Prateik Babbar, and daughter Juhi Babbar, for an evening full of laughter and entertainment.

episodes.name: Team Bholaa In The House
episodes.overview: Superstar Ajay Devgn and the sensational Tabu sit down with Kapil to promote their latest release, 'Bholaa', and enjoy an evening filled with endless laughter and entertainment.

episodes.name: India's Best Dancer Ka Tadka
episodes.overview: Terence Lewis, Sonali Bendre, Jay Bhanushali and Geeta Kapur grace the stage of The Kapil Sharma Show as they bring the new season of 'India's Best Dancer' to the audience.

episodes.name: Gumraah Ki Team Ke Saath Mulaqat
episodes.overview: Mrunal Thakur, Aditya Roy Kapur, Deepak Kalra, Mithoon and Vishal Mishra grace their presence on The Kapil Sharma Show as they promote their upcoming film 'Gumraah' and enjoy an evening with Kapil's team.

episodes.name: Star Cricketers And Their Better Halves
episodes.overview: Kapil Sharma welcomes star cricketers Aakash Chopra, Suresh Raina and Deepak Chahar, along with their better halves, on his show, for a night of fun and a ton of gossip.

episodes.name: Reminiscing The 90s With Manisha And Mahima
episodes.overview: Manisha Koirala and Mahima Chaudhary, the superstar heroines of the 90s reminisce about their times and enjoy an evening full of love and laughter.

episodes.name: Team Bhaijaan
episodes.overview: Kapil welcomes the star cast of the upcoming film, 'Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan', Salman Khan and Pooja Hegde, to have an evening full of fun and celebration.

episodes.name: The Pilgaonkar Special
episodes.overview: Actor and director Sachin Pilgaonkar, along with his wife Supriya Pilgaonkar and daughter Shriya Pilgaonkar, grace the stage of Kapil's show and share some hearty laughs with the team.

episodes.name: Parde Ke Piche Ke Sitare
episodes.overview: Kapil welcomes well-known stars behind the curtains, Neeta Lulla, Dabboo Ratnani, Allan Amin, Aalim Hakim, Mickey Contractor and Ganesh Acharya, to grace the stage of The Kapil Sharma Show.

episodes.name: NRI Wives Ki Team Ke Saath Mulakaat
episodes.overview: The star cast of the upcoming film 'NRI Wives', Bhagyashree, Samir Soni, Raima Sen, Hiten Tejwani and Aditi Govitrikar grace their presence on the show and enjoy the evening with Kapil and team.

episodes.name: Comedy Aur Garmi Ka Milan
episodes.overview: The star cast of the 2003 classic 'Haasil' and the hit Sony LIV original series 'Garmi' along with director Tigmanshu Dhulia arrive on The Kapil Sharma Show to share laughs and some interesting stories from the set.

episodes.name: Jogira Sara Ra Ra With Kapil And Team
episodes.overview: Actors Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Neha Sharma, Zarina Wahab and Mahaakshay Chakraborty grace their presence on Kapil's show as they promote their upcoming film 'Jogira Sara Ra Ra'.

episodes.name: The Queens Of TV
episodes.overview: The four queens that rule the world of television, Urvashi Dholakia, Divyanka Tripathi, Anita Hassanandani, and Ankita Lokhande, arrive on the show to share some laughs with Kapil.

episodes.name: Aazam Ki Team Ke Saath Gupshup
episodes.overview: The star cast of the upcoming film Aazam, Raza Murad, Govind Namdev, Sayaji Shinde, Jimmy Sheirgill, Abhimanyu Singh and Indraneil Sengupta grace the stage of The Kapil Sharma Show and have a heartfelt conversation with the team.

episodes.name: The Leading Ladies Of India
episodes.overview: The leading ladies of the country, Raveena Tandon, Guneet Monga Kapoor, and Sudha Murty, arrive on the show as Kapil celebrates their extraordinary achievements.

episodes.name: Chatrapathi Ki Team Ke Saath Mulaqat
episodes.overview: Bellamkonda Sai Sreenivas, Nushrratt Bharuccha and Bhagyashree grace their presence on Kapil's show to promote their film 'Chatrapathi' and laugh out loud with the team.

episodes.name: Stars Se Bhari Shyaam
episodes.overview: The evergreen, talented and beautiful stars from the '80s and '90s era, Sangeeta Bijlani, Varsha Usgaonkar, and Mandakini, arrive on the show to share some laughs with Kapil.

episodes.name: Legendary Musicians Take Over The Stage
episodes.overview: Legendary singers Shankar Mahadevan, Akriti Kakar, Shaan, Nirmal Kakar, Sukriti Kakar, Prakriti Kakar, Shashwat Singh, Romy and Nikhita Gandhi grace The Kapil Sharma show and create a musical atmosphere on the stage.

episodes.name: Stars From India And Beyond
episodes.overview: Nigerian superstar Rema, the artist behind the hit song 'Calm Down', arrives on The Kapil Sharma Show. And later, the illustrious Kabir Bedi, Pooja Bedi and Alaya F grace the show with their presence.

episodes.name: Hatke Bachke Night With Kapil
episodes.overview: Vicky Kaushal and Sara Ali Khan take over the stage with Kapil and the team as they promote their film 'Zara Hatke Zara Bachke'.

episodes.name: Laughter With The Legends
episodes.overview: Cricketing legends Brett Lee and Chris Gayle sit down with Kapil for a night filled with loads of laughter and unlimited entertainment.

episodes.name: Ek Shaam Rj's Ke Naam
episodes.overview: RJ Anmol, RJ Anurag Pandey, RJ Naved, RJ Jeeturaaj and RJ Malishka join Kapil on the show and spend an evening of laughter with the team.

episodes.name: Carry On Jatta 3 Ki Star Cast
episodes.overview: Sonam Bajwa, Gippy Grewal and other stars from the upcoming film 'Carry On Jatta 3' arrive on the show to share some laughs and their hilarious stories with Kapil.

episodes.name: OTT Stars Ki Mehfil
episodes.overview: Sumeet Vyas, Rajesh Tailang, Amit Sial, Anchal Singh and Tridha Choudhury, the stars from the digital space have a fun conversation with Kapil and the team.

episodes.name: Best Of The Best
episodes.overview: Anand - Milind, Sameer Anjaan and Udit Narayan, legends of the musical world, who worked together on a beautiful song, ‘Dil Mein Badhi Halchal Hai’, spend a fun-filled evening on The Kapil Sharma Show along with four stars of Indian Idol.

episodes.name: Satyaprem Ki Katha Ki Team Ke Saath Masti
episodes.overview: Kiara Advani, Kartik Aaryan, Gajraj Rao and Supriya Pathak grace the stage of The Kapil Sharma Show as they promote their upcoming film 'Satyaprem Ki Katha'.

episodes.name: Tribute To The Lyricists
episodes.overview: It's an unforgettable gathering of poetic brilliance on The Kapil Sharma Show as the most celebrated lyricists of Indian cinema come together.

episodes.name: 70's Ki Raunak
episodes.overview: Superstars from the 70's, Reena Roy and Moushumi Chatterjee, join Kapil on the show for a night filled with unlimited laughter and entertainment.

episodes.name: Hosts Take Over The Show
episodes.overview: The hosts from the television world, Renuka Shahane, Mini Mathur, Rich Aniruddha, Deepti Bhatnagar and Parizad Kolah grace their presence on The Kapil Sharma Show to spend an evening of fun and laughter.

episodes.name: Gadar 2 Ke Saath Masti Aur Dhamaal
episodes.overview: The star cast of the much anticipated 'Gadar 2', Sunny Deol and Ameesha Patel join Kapil for a night filled with excitement and entertainment.

episodes.name: Ek Rangeen Safar Ka Ant
episodes.overview: Superstars Anil Kapoor, Aditya Roy Kapoor, Sobhita Dhulipala, Ravi Behl and Tillotama Shome grace the season finale episode of The Kapil Sharma Show and enjoy an evening with Kapil and his team.

episodes.name: The Night Manager Of Entertainment
episodes.overview: The star cast of the hit web series, Anil Kapoor, Aditya Roy Kapoor, Sobhita Dhulipala, Ravi Behl and Tillotama Shome, rejoin Kapil as they create many more moments of pure laughter and entertainment together.
